1: From the deep water[c] I cry out to you, O Lord.
2: O Lord, listen to me.[d] Pay attention to[e] my plea for mercy.
3: If you, O Lord, were to keep track of[f] sins, O Lord, who could stand before you?[g]
4: But[h] you are willing to forgive,[i] so that you might[j] be honored.[k]
5: I rely on[l] the Lord. I rely on him with my whole being;[m] I wait for his assuring word.[n]
6: I yearn for the Lord,[o] more than watchmen do for the morning, yes, more than watchmen do for the morning.[p]
7: O Israel, hope in the Lord, for the Lord exhibits loyal love,[q] and is more than willing to deliver.[r]
8: He will deliver[s] Israel from all their sins.[t]
